// imports

import process from './src/process.js'
import init from './src/init.js'
import success from './src/success.js'
import failure from './src/failure.js'
import listen from './src/listen.js'
import assign from './src/assign.js'
import assignRange from './src/assignRange.js'
import getRanges from './src/getRanges.js'
import processRange from './src/processRange.js'
import processNote from './src/processNote.js'


/**
 * MidiMapper
 */

class MidiMapper{
    constructor(devices = ['all']){
        this.devices = devices;
        this.map = {};
        this.init();
    }
}

Object.assign(MidiMapper.prototype,{
    process,
    init,
    success,
    failure,
    listen,
    assign,
    assignRange,
    getRanges,
    processRange,
    processNote
})

export default MidiMapper;
